# action

**Instance Property**

The selector on the target object that is invoked when a user interacts with the slider or either of the accessories.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var action: Selector? { get set }
```

## Handling slider interaction

- **target**: An object that is notified when a user interacts with the slider or either of the accessories.
